text: Carbohydrates * Dietary sources — Primarily from plants, such as starch (complex carbohydrates) in grains and vegetables — Sugars (mono- and disaccharides) in fruits, sugarcane, sugar beets, honey, and milk — Insoluble fiber. cellulose in vegetables provides roughage — Soluble fiber: pectin in apples and citrus fruits reduces blood cholesterol levels — Small amount in milk sugar, glycogen in meats
